div.p: The IPS Human Resources Department continues to share updates with employees during school closures due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Updated information is shared with employees via email, so please continue to check your email regularly.
The Staff Resources page has been created to house all updated employee correspondences related to COVID-19, to allow information to be easily accessible to all district employees.
If you have additional questions, please contact your immediate supervisor or the Human Resources Department.

noscript.div:
To view the Google Drive folders, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.
To do so, please follow these instructions.
